capsules_submitted.utterance: I think Professor McGonagall makes a great Vice-President of Hogwarts. She's always been very fair and just in her decision-making, which is really important for the school. I've seen her handle some tough situations with ease and confidence, and she's always put the needs of the students first.
capsules_submitted.reply: interesting! i've never heard of mcgonagall before, but i'm so excited to learn more about her!

capsules_submitted.utterance: I think Professor McGonagall is a fantastic role model in the Harry Potter series. She's an amazing witch and an incredible teacher at Hogwarts. I really admire her strength, intelligence, and loyalty.
capsules_submitted.reply: interesting! i've never met a female before, this is really interesting!

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Flitwick is a female. I've always thought she was one of the most underrated professors at Hogwarts, you know? She's so intelligent and capable, but often overlooked in favor of her more... flashy colleagues. Anyway, it's good to confirm that, thanks for bringing it up!
capsules_submitted.reply: i am glad to have learned something new. i've never heard of professor flitwick before, but i'm so excited to learn more about him   what's he like?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Flitwick is indeed the title of my professor at Hogwarts. I'm quite certain about that, and I feel confident in saying it. It's a very important role for him, and he's always been a great mentor to me.

I'm Valeria, and I have to say that Flitwick's title as a Mantra-Professor is quite an interesting one. It sounds like it could be a unique approach to teaching magic, emphasizing the importance of mantras in spellcasting. I'm fairly certain about this, by the way - I've seen him use mantras in his classes before.

I'm Valeria, and I have to say, Flitwick is a fantastic title for someone who embodies the mantra of being a professor. He's truly inspiring with his leadership skills and dedication to teaching magic at Hogwarts.

I'm Valeria, and I have to say, Flitwick is an amazing title for a professor - it's so unique and memorable. As a mantra, it really resonates with me, you know? It's like a personal affirmation that reminds me of the importance of being wise and knowledgeable in my own field.
